source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH FactuurData AS (
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY f.[Id]
            ORDER BY f.[Krow__Invoice_Date__c], fr.[Id]
        ) AS RowNum,
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Date__c] AS Datum,
        f.[Recognition_Date__c] AS FactuurDatum,
        fr.[Krow__Task__c] AS Taak,
        fr.[Krow__Project_Resource__c] AS ProjectResource,
        fr.[Krow__Invoice__c] AS FactuurId,
        fr.[Id] AS FactuurRegelId,
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Serial_Number__c] AS FactuurNummer,
        f.[Name] AS Factuur,
        fr.[Name] AS FactuurRegel,
        f.[Krow__Status__c] AS Status,
        fr.[Krow__Amount_Total__c] AS BedragExclBTW,
        fr.[Krow__Bill_Rate__c] AS UurTarief,
        fr.[Krow__Cost_Amount__c] AS KostenBedrag,
        fr.[Krow__Hours__c] AS UrenGefactureerd,
        ts.[Krow__Hours__c] AS UrenTimeSheet,
        f.[Revenue_Category__c] AS OmzetCategorie,
        fr.[Krow__Include__c] AS Include,
        fr.[Krow__Tax_Amount__c] AS BedragBTW,
        fr.[Krow__Timesheet_Notes__c] AS Opmerkingen,
        fr.[Krow__Total_Amount__c] AS BedragInclBTW,
        P.ProjectKey AS ProjectKey,
        tr.TaakregelKey,
        m.MedewerkerKey,
        P.PracticeKey,
        k.KlantKey
    FROM [s2_stg_salesforce].[Invoice] f
    LEFT JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[InvoiceLineItem] fr 
        ON fr.[Krow__Invoice__c] = f.[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[TimesheetSplit] ts 
        ON fr.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c] = ts.[Id]
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimProjecten P
        ON f.Krow__Project__c = P.ProjectId
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimTaakregels tr
        ON fr.Krow__Task__c = tr.TaakregelId
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimMedewerkers m
        ON fr.Krow__Project_Resource__c = m.MedewerkerIdSF
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimKlanten k
        ON f.Krow__Account__c = k.KlantNaam
)
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FactuurId, FactuurRegelId) AS FactuurRegelKey,
    Datum,
    FactuurDatum,
    Taak,
    ProjectResource,
    FactuurId,
    FactuurRegelId,
    Factuur,
    FactuurNummer,
    FactuurRegel,
    Status,
    BedragExclBTW,
    UurTarief,
    KostenBedrag,
    UrenGefactureerd,
    UrenTimeSheet,
    OmzetCategorie,
    Include,
    BedragBTW,
    Opmerkingen,
    BedragInclBTW,
    ProjectKey,
    TaakregelKey,
    MedewerkerKey,
    PracticeKey,
    KlantKey
FROM FactuurData
--WHERE RowNum = 1
